Title: Norway’s Snohvit LNG plant loads first cargo after a three-week shutdown
Description: The Equinor-operated 4.2 mtpa Snohvit LNG plant in Norway’s Melkoya Island near Hammerfest has resumed loading operations and is poised to ship its first cargo since its shutdown on May 4 due to compressor failure.
Author: CK

Title: Operations at Pluto LNG unaffected by explosion; planned maintenance underway
Description: An explosion at the Woodside-operated 4.9 mtpa Pluto LNG site in Western Australia on May 26 has not impacted plant operations, with it continuing its planned maintenance at the facility.
Author: CK
